What’s Going On With Lil Wayne?

posted by Andres Tardio on December 4, 2014 in News

Image via Music Times

Today, Lil Wayne tweeted that Birdman and Cash Money refuse to release Tha Carter V and that he wants off the label. This could all blow over, but we know one thing: people are reacting with some very interesting theories about what’s going on with Wayne. They vary from preposterous to plausible and horrible to hilarious. Check the gallery below for some of these theories.

Theory: Lil Wayne Was Hacked
